author: rickhall
msg: Moved native library verification to the resolver, since the spec
says they are resolve-time checks, not install-time checks. Also
fixed a bug in OS version parsing. (FELIX-1360)

author: mreutegg
msg: JCR-2214: Avoid string concatenation in AbstractBundlePersistenceManager

author: mamta
msg: I have made changes to NetworkServerControlImpl.java so we handle the exceptions during different steps of server shutdown and continue with the next step in shutdown rather than bailing out after the first exception.

author: mduerig
msg: JCR-1797: SPI: RepositoryService.getItemInfos should be allowed to return entries outside of the requested tree.

author: spoole
msg: changes to anttasks to accomodate extra doclet support.  Addtion of xmljavadoc generator
